column2: verse_text

column2: Brothers, do not be children in your minds; but in malice be babies, and in your minds be mature.
And my dwelling shall be over them, and I will be their God and they shall be my people.
And Zadok, a young man, valiant in prowess, and his father’s house twenty-two captains.
And all the days that Adam lived were nine hundred and thirty years and he died
But be doers of the word and not hearers only, deceiving yourselves.
column10: The only letter by this writer

column2: He heals the broken-hearted and binds up their wounds.

And every living thing was wiped out that was on the face of the ground, man and beast and creeping thing and bird of the heavens; and they were wiped out from the earth; and Noah only was left, and those who were with him in the ark.
Do not be overcome by evil, but overcome evil with good.
column10: The only letter to this congregation

column2: So Jesus, lifting up his eyes and seeing that a great crowd was coming to him, said to Philip, Where shall we buy bread for these people to eat
For the wages of sin is death, but God’s gift is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.
column10: The only letter to this congregation

column2: And I have made your name known to them and will make it known, that the love you had for me may be in them and I in them
Her children rise up and call her blessed; her husband also, and he praises her.
Says Jehovah, your Redeemer, the Holy One of Israel: I am Jehovah your God, who teaches you to profit, who leads you in the way you should go
Give Jehovah the glory due his name,  bring an offering and come into his courts.
And Moses said, By this you shall know that Jehovah has sent me to do all these works, that I have not done them of my own mind.
For the vision is still for the appointed time, and it hastens toward the end and does not lie; though it tarry, wait for it, because it will surely come, it will not delay.
And do not be conformed to this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind, that you may prove what is God’s will, what is good and acceptable and perfect.
column10: The only letter to this congregation

column2: And the things that you heard from me among many witnesses, commit to faithful men who will be competent to teach others also.
And when he had removed him, he raised up David to be their king, to whom he also testified and said, I have found David the son of Jesse, a man after my heart, who will do all my will.
Commit your way to Jehovah; trust also in him, and he will bring it to pass.
And now why do you delay? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.
But there is forgiveness with you, that you may be feared.
So when you do a charitable deed, do not sound a trumpet before you, as the hypocrites do in the synagogues and in the streets, that they may have glory from men. I tell you, they have their reward.
Take heed to yourself and to your teaching; continue in them, for in doing this you will save both yourself and those who hear you.
A capable wife who can find? For her worth is far above jewels.
And be kind to one another, tenderhearted, forgiving each other, as God also in Christ forgave you.
column10: The  only  letter to this congregation

column2: Blessed be Jehovah my rock, who trains my hands for war and my fingers for battle.
From that time Jesus began to preach and say, Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.
But the end of all things is at hand  therefore be sober and watch to prayer.
Love bears all things, believes all things, hopes all things, endures all things.
Those who sin rebuke in the sight of all, that the rest also may fear.
